Header: Commanders Invited for Prize-Giving Ceremony of Thewanpiddy School
Content: Commander 651 Brigade and Commanding Officer of 19 Sri Lanka Light Infantry (SLLI) were among special invitees who were invited to the annual prize-giving ceremony of Thewanpiddy Roman Catholic Tamil Mixed School, held recently at the school premises. Rev. Deny Calister of Fransis Xavier in Thewanpiddy Catholic Church,  Mr A Pathinadan, Secretary, Northern Province and the Zonal Educational Director, Madu, K Sathyabalan also participated in the event.
